com.example.mac.bugfree.controller

Class ElasticsearchImageOfflineController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.mac.bugfree.controller.ElasticsearchImageOfflineController

  • public class ElasticsearchImageOfflineController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores file from elastic search and stores user's image to local file when corresponding method is called.

      • AddImageTask

        public void AddImageTask(android.content.Context context,
                         java.lang.String imageBase64,
                         java.lang.String base64Id,
                         java.lang.String OriginId)
        Add image task (local). The image id will be add to uploadArrayList and the base64String will be store to local file.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        imageBase64 - the image base 64
        base64Id - the base 64 id
        OriginId - the origin id

      • DeleteImageTask

        public void DeleteImageTask(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.String imageId)
        Add the image to be deleted to the array list, need to delete the local file in the activity.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        imageId - the image id

      • GetImageTask

        public ImageForElasticSearch GetImageTask(android.content.Context context,
                                          java.lang.String imageId)
        Get image for elastic search from local file by id.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        imageId - the image id
        Returns:
        the image for elastic search

      • prepImageOffline

        public void prepImageOffline(android.content.Context context,
                             User user)
        This method is for newly signed in user, it creates all the empty file for offline function for image This image offline function is for the current user's image only. Being called once after valid signin and at online. There are three files to be created: 1. Several image file (file stores base64String, file name is the unique id) 2. ImageOriginList.sav (Contains the [arraylist of [strings of [image unique id]]] user Originally have in the ElasticSearch) 3. ImageUploadList.sav (Contains the [arraylist of [strings of [image unique id]]] to be uploaded to the ElasticSearch) 4. ImageDeleteList.sav (Contains the [arraylist of [strings of [image unique id]]] to be deleted from the ElasticSearch)
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        user - the user

      • saveBase64

        public void saveBase64(android.content.Context context,
                       java.lang.String imageBase64,
                       java.lang.String base64Id)
        Save the base64String to file name by the uniqueID
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        imageBase64 - the image base 64 String
        base64Id - the base 64 id

        public boolean updateOfflineArrayList(android.content.Context context,
                                      java.lang.String mode,
                                      java.lang.String imageIdToBeSave,
                                      java.lang.String imageIdToBeDelete)
        Load the origin list and add/delete the ids in the array list appropriately
        Parameters:

        mode - the mode
        imageIdToBeSave - the image id to be save
        imageIdToBeDelete - the image id to be delete
        Returns:
        the boolean

      • loadImageList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> loadImageList(android.content.Context context,
                                                           java.lang.String mode)
        Receives parameter of current context and the mode of loading, to load the online arraylist, use "online",to load the upload list, use "upload", if want to have delete list, use "delete"
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        mode - the mode ("upload", "delete", "online")
        Returns:
        array list
